leftContent.title: Lefty – Surplus Food Marketplace
leftContent.subtitle: DevOps: Docker/Nginx/Github CI/CD/AWS
items: A mobile application that connects users with restaurants to rescue surplus food at discounted prices, reducing food waste while saving money
Accelerated developer onboarding by 80% (2 days → 2 hours) and ensured environment consistency by containerizing the backend (Nginx, MySQL, Node.js) with Docker Compose
Boosted ”nearby meal” search speeds by 8x (sub-70ms) using Upstash Redis, ensuring performance stability via automated latency tests in GitHub Actions CI/CD
Engineered AWS S3/CDN pipeline to handle 10K+ images/day, eliminating DB storage and cutting bandwidth costs

leftContent.title: Application of RAG and LLM in Financial Q&A
leftContent.subtitle: LLM/RAG/Deep Learning/Pytorch
items: Integrated LLM and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) techniques to develop an effective Financial Q&A model
Fine-tuned the Multilingual retriever and BAAI reranker within a RAG framework, optimizing the retrieval process to provide the most relevant answers from the question documents
Achieved 89.37% accuracy on a contest dataset of 900 questions, ranking 42nd out of 487 participants, placing in the top 8%

leftContent.title: R-Tree Based Lost Pet Locator
leftContent.subtitle: R-Tree/React Native/Node.js/Expo
items: Implemented the R-Tree algorithm to optimize the search and management of geospatial data for tracking lost pet
Developed full-stack application using React Native and Node.js, integrating R-Tree for efficient and seamless functionality
Used Expo to deploy universal native apps for Android and iOS, streamlining both development and deployment
